name: goku-discord-bot
description: Talk to Goku in Discord! A simple Discord bot.

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Downloading Vosk model...' && curl -L -o model.zip https://alphacephei.com/vosk/models/vosk-model-small-en-us-0.15.zip && unzip -o model.zip -d . && rm model.zip && echo 'Vosk model installed successfully.'
